page.title: 12EVENTS IN KILREA
page.content: {EVENTS:}EACH YEAR THE CIRCUS OF COURTNEY BROTHERS' VISITS THE TOWN OF KILREA.THE PEOPLE LOOK FORWARD TO THIS ANNUAL EVENT. {THE BIG TOP:}THE BIG TOP OR CIRCUS IS USUALLY IN THE FAIR HILL OR IN THE FOOTBALL PITCH AT THE BOTTOM OF COLERAINE STREET.CIRCUS TICKETS ARE SOLD FROM A CARAVAN IN THE DIAMOND OR IN COLERAINE STREET.TICKET PRICES ARE USUALLY 1POUND. {CIRCUS ACTS:}IN THE CIRCUS THERE ARE ACROBATS,TIGHTROPE WALKERS,CLOWNS,JUGGLERS,ELEPHANTS,HORS ES AND PONIES.THE ANIMALS GENERALLY DO TRICKS.
